wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Sanders (8 May 1901 – 26 September 1983) was an English teacher and professional footballer who played for London University, Peterborough & Fletton United, Northfleet United, Tottenham Hotspur and Clapton Orient.

response: * Arthur Sanders (1898–1974), Royal Air Force air marshal
* Arthur Sanders (footballer) (1901–1983), English footballer and teacher
* Arthur Sanders (RAF officer) (1898–1974), Royal Air Force air marshal
